sql.query:
SELECT user_id
FROM t_user_log
WHERE login_token = :P1 /* {{$_POST.logintoken}} */ AND login_from = :P2 /* {{'Android'}} */
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT fname, lname, mobile, is_watsapp, watsapp_no, address, pin, ps, district, state, country, wallet_bal
FROM m_customer
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */ AND status = :P2 /* {{1}} */ AND user_type_id = :P3 /* {{6}} */

SELECT id, prod_id, price_id, user_id, prod_unit_price, prod_qty, total_price, cart_mrp, cart_purchase
FROM r_cart
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */

SELECT id
FROM m_customer
WHERE blank3 = '1' AND user_type_id = :P1 /* {{5}} */
ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT SUM(rc.total_price::float) as total_amt
FROM r_cart rc
WHERE rc.user_id = @user

SELECT id, promo_code
FROM promo_code
WHERE auto_apply = :P1 /* {{'Yes'}} */ AND status = :P2 /* {{1}} */ AND start_date < :P3 /* {{NOW}} */ AND end_date >= :P4 /* {{NOW}} */ AND (user_id = :P5 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */ OR allotted_for = :P6 /* {{'All'}} */)
ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountNewCust
FROM r_order
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */ AND applied_promo_id = :P2 /* {{CountCode.id}} */ AND (status <> :P3 /* {{5}} */ OR status <> :P4 /* {{2}} */)

SELECT id, promo_name, promo_code, amt_or_percent, promo_amt, promo_per, cashback_amt_or_per, cashback_amt, cashback_per
FROM promo_code
WHERE auto_apply = :P1 /* {{'Yes'}} */ AND status = :P2 /* {{1}} */ AND start_date < :P3 /* {{NOW}} */ AND end_date >= :P4 /* {{NOW}} */ AND (user_id = :P5 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */ OR allotted_for = :P6 /* {{'All'}} */)
ORDER BY id ASC

UPDATE m_customer
SET wallet_bal = :P1 /* {{WalletNetAmt}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */

INSERT INTO r_order
(order_id, user_id, total_amt, discount, delevery_amt, user_name, address, mobile, whatsapp, pin, ps, dist, state, country, created_by, created_on, status, payment_status, ex_charge_amt, applied_promo_id, wallet_bal, wallet_cashback_amt, wallet_deduct_amt, wallet_closing_amt, order_assigned_to) VALUES (:P1 /* {{OrderId}} */, :P2 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */, :P3 /* {{CartSumAmt[0].total_amt}} */, :P4 /* {{InstantDiscount}} */, :P5 /* {{ShippingCharge}} */, :P6 /* {{GetUserDetails.fname+' '+GetUserDetails.lname}} */, :P7 /* {{GetUserDetails.address}} */, :P8 /* {{GetUserDetails.mobile}} */, :P9 /* {{GetUserDetails.watsapp_no}} */, :P10 /* {{GetUserDetails.pin}} */, :P11 /* {{GetUserDetails.ps}} */, :P12 /* {{GetUserDetails.district}} */, :P13 /* {{GetUserDetails.state}} */, :P14 /* {{GetUserDetails.country}} */, :P15 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */, :P16 /* {{NOW}} */, :P17 /* {{1}} */, :P18 /* {{$_POST.payment_mode}} */, :P19 /* {{OtherCharges}} */, :P20 /* {{NewUserCode.id?NewUserCode.id:0}} */, :P21 /* {{GetUserDetails.wallet_bal}} */, :P22 /* {{WalletCashback}} */, :P23 /* {{$_POST.inp_wallet_amt}} */, :P24 /* {{WalletNetAmt}} */, :P25 /* {{GetDelivery.id}} */)

INSERT INTO r_order_details
(order_table_id, prod_id, price_id, cart_id, user_id, prod_qty, each_unit_price, each_net_amt, order_status, created_by, created_on, purchase_price) VALUES (:P1 /* {{AddOrder.identity}} */, :P2 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].prod_id}} */, :P3 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].price_id}} */, :P4 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].id}} */, :P5 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */, :P6 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].prod_qty}} */, :P7 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].prod_unit_price}} */, :P8 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].total_price}} */, :P9 /* {{1}} */, :P10 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */, :P11 /* {{NOW}} */, :P12 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].cart_purchase}} */)

DELETE
FROM r_cart
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */ OR ip_address = :P2 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */
